items.example: The legal tutor ci field is required.

categories.description: List of categories associated with the area

Categories.title: Categories Model
Categories.description: This model represents the Categories table in the database.

id.description: The unique identifier for the category.

area_id.description: The ID of the area to which this category belongs.

range_course.description: An array representing the range of courses available in this category.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the category was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the category was last updated.
